definition: quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])
the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]
quilt cover/to have money stuck (in stocks, real estate etc)
quilt wrapped around the body as a tube (traditional bedding)/(contemporary) bedding/quilt/blankets/cover/bed
peridium (envelope or coat of fungi, e.g. puffballs)

sentences.english: All eastbound trains have been cancelled due to faulty signals.
sentences.chinese: 所有向东开去的火车由于信号错误而均被取消。

sentences.english: The pity of it is that an intelligent man appears to have been seduced by the sound of his own voice.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，这位智者似乎被自己的声音误导了。

sentences.english: I screamed in pain as the knife cut the surface layer of my skin.
sentences.chinese: 我的皮肤被割开了，我痛苦的嘶叫着。

sentences.english: Jack subdues the suspect but realizes Hampton has been shot.
sentences.chinese: 杰克制服了嫌犯，但他发现杰西被子弹击中了。

sentences.english: Short-lived Sui Dynasty, Tang Dynasty, will soon be replaced.
sentences.chinese: 隋朝短暂，很快被唐朝取代。

sentences.english: Mass armies (in most societies) have been replaced by highly trained professional-technical military forces.
sentences.chinese: 数量庞大的军队已经被高技术军队取代。

sentences.english: They're weighed and fed automatically into mixers.
sentences.chinese: 用料称好重量之后，被自动送入搅拌机中。

sentences.english: He died in 1892, his death being considered as a national calamity.
sentences.chinese: 他死于1892年，他的逝世被认为是举国的不幸。

sentences.english: He felt browned off when he heard that he waw dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 当他听到自己被解职时感到很不痛快。

sentences.english: Experience is a gift being given.
sentences.chinese: 履历是一份礼品，我们正在被付与着。

sentences.english: The branch or bud that is grafted is called the scion.
sentences.chinese: 嫁接上去的枝或芽被称为接穗。

sentences.english: A number of investigators have used the fluorescent-antibody (FA) technique for Salmonella detection.
sentences.chinese: 因此，沙门氏菌检测的荧光抗体技术为能被广范应用。

sentences.english: This past offseason there were tons of reports circulating around Kobe Bryant's wish to be traded.
sentences.chinese: 过去的那个休赛期，有很多关于科比想被交易的报道。

sentences.english: Many were asked, but few were able to answer.
sentences.chinese: 许多人被问到，可是很少人答得出来。

sentences.english: The insect found itself entangled in an inextricable net.
sentences.chinese: 昆虫发现自己被缠在一个逃脱不掉的罗网中。

definition: (completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to hold/to contain/to grasp/to take hold of/handle/particle marking the following noun as a direct object/classifier for objects with handle/classifier for small objects: handful
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
to meet by chance (usually with misfortune)/classifier for events: time, turn, incident
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
to receive (praise, an education, punishment etc)/to be ...ed (praised, educated, punished etc)
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
